omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		apc.NHSNumber,
		p.ProcedureDateOPCS as PrimaryProcedureDate,
		p.ProcedureOPCS as PrimaryProcedure
from omop_staging.sus_APC apc
	inner join omop_staging.sus_OPCSProcedure p
		on apc.MessageId = p.MessageId
where NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: procedure_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `procedure` domain.

omopColumns.name: procedure_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. `EHR Administration record`

omopColumns.name: procedure_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve OPCS4 codes to OMOP concepts. If code cannot be mapped, map using the parent code.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		apc.NHSNumber,
		p.ProcedureDateOPCS as PrimaryProcedureDate,
		p.ProcedureOPCS as PrimaryProcedure
from omop_staging.sus_APC apc
	inner join omop_staging.sus_OPCSProcedure p
		on apc.MessageId = p.MessageId
where NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		apc.NHSNumber,
		p.ProcedureDateOPCS as PrimaryProcedureDate,
		p.ProcedureOPCS as PrimaryProcedure
from omop_staging.sus_APC apc
	inner join omop_staging.sus_OPCSProcedure p
		on apc.MessageId = p.MessageId
where NHSNumber is not null
